title: Gigantic Drums Volume 2
description: 30 orchestral, tribal, electronic and industrial style drum tracks meticulously crafted to be hard-hitting and powerful yet versatile. They are perfect for fast paced action games or epic story lines as well as more quirky or abstract games.
longDescription:
Audio Preview Mix: https://youtu.be/Kr1-gpT1xxU


30 orchestral, tribal, electronic and industrial style drum tracks meticulously crafted to be hard-hitting and powerful yet versatile. They are perfect for fast paced action games or epic story lines as well as more quirky or abstract games. The sounds and rhythms used were inspired by action, war and suspense movie soundtracks, as well as the more industrial side of electronic music and tribal percussion.


Each drum track cuts straight to the point and creates a strong atmosphere. Each track also seamlessly loops and is labeled by tempo and style, making them easy to manipulate and mould into whatever context your project requires.
technicalDetails:
Number of audio wavs: 30

Number of audio cues: 30  

Sample rate / Bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAV files 

Intended Platforms: All

Each track seamlessly loops and is labeled by tempo and style.
